phrases: It is like the report said...
and yet there is not a drop of blood, let alone any bodies here.
Then... the villagers of Ragako were able to safely evacuate?
then the Titans were having a field day in a completely empty village.
Furthermore... why would they evacuate without even taking a single horse?
This is a portrait of Conny Springer's parents?
Will it be your petty life... or Christa's future?
It is up to you to decide.
You are saying to trust Ymir as a warrior?
Is not she the one who ate Marcel?
she probably roamed around and lived only caring about herself.
And as cute as Christa is, we have other reasons to bring her to our side.
She is an important person in a family of the Church.
If Eren turns out not to be the Coordinate, our job is not over yet.
Having Christa with us at that point will make our search much easier.
Are they planning to leave before the sun sets?
Let us bring an end to it.
The next time we come here,
we can take Annie, Christa, and that back home.
That way we will not have to come here anymore.
And our mission will be over.
When we get to our hometown, tell Annie how you feel.
You are both murderers with short lives ahead.
Who better to understand what we have gone through than one of us?
Are not we waiting until night?
Eren, do not try to resist.
Come on, do not get violent with me.
Look at the shape that I am in.
Does it look like I can resist?
When you turned back into a human, do you remember the person you ate?
But if it was five years ago...
Was it one of your comrades?
It is not your fault for forgetting.
It was the same for us, too.
Eren does not seem to remember either.
Do you resent me for it?
I am not sure... I... do not know.
You probably did not want to eat a human either...
How long were you wandering outside the walls for?
I was stuck in a nightmare that would never end.
Any detours and we will be too late.
We will force our way through!
For now, let us get to a place without Titans!
We need to get as far away as possible!
My Titan form is not very fast.
If I get surrounded, I will not be able to protect you guys!
Then why did not we just wait until nightfall?!
Did the Scouts come to rescue us?
Unless they brought loads of horses over the wall,
that scouting formation will not work.
I did not think it would happen so soon.
It is Eren's fault for going berserk.
If you want her, now's the chance!
You cannot see her from here!
She is such a good-natured person, it is stupid!
I guarantee she came to save me!
Even if that is true, it is no use!
Our chance of succeeding is way too low!
How will you get Christa out of that formation?
Will that be after I am eaten by one of your warriors?
Christa is indispensable to us, too!
Go prove it to me this instant!
It has to be now or never!
I want to see her right now!
I will never get a chance...
Information Available for Public Disclosure Ymir's Hometown
It is not known where Ymir's hometown is located.
However, its location is most certainly outside the confines of the walls.
We do not even know if we can escape ourselves, let alone go back for her.
If anyone, it is Christa I want to save from this conflict!
This is for Christa's own sake!
Is it... really for Christa's sake?
Will I have to lie to myself again?
You are going to come live with us from now on.
You will be able to live a brand-new life now.
A brand-new life... needs a brand-new name.
That day... was the first time I lied to myself.
From that point on, I convinced myself... that I never had a choice.
It is this Lady Ymir who inherits the blood of the king.
As long as Lady Ymir is with us, we will be blessed with immortality.
To be honest... it was not all that bad.
My food was not cold anymore...
And neither was my bed off the ground.
But more than all... was the feeling of being needed by someone.
I served a purpose in someone is life for the first time ever.
To me, that was more precious than anything else.
She is the one who did it!
She told us she has the blood of the king!
All we did was believe her!
I was cruelly reminded that everything in my life...
The blood of the king runs through me!
If that is what it took to save everyone else...
Things did not work that way.
It is not that I was being punished for deceiving all those people.
It was for convincing myself to believe... to feel needed by someone.
It is what I deserved for continuing to lie to myself.
If there was such a thing as fate, I can only laugh at how fickle it can be.
I was done with telling lies.
I was not going to lie to myself anymore.
From then on, I would live honest to myself.
She was given the name Christa Lenz and sent off to become a cadet.
She would have been better off not being born.
It makes no difference to me.
So you are trying to do something nice, huh?
I could tell right away......that you were the same as me...
That you were someone desperately trying to convince yourself...
I will not ask you to understand.
In this environment, I am the strongest one here.
Do not you think a forest like this is where I can shine the most?
If I became a Titan, I might be powerless compared to you,
but I can jump through the trees and move swiftly.
I could snatch Eren away from you and go back to meet up with the Scouts...
If you do not agree to take Christa with you right now,
I will get in your way and fight you right here.
Do not you care what happens to her?!
We cannot help her that way!
Even if it means taking her future away, I will do what it takes to live and meet her.
I might be the shittiest person there ever was.
You guys do not know what it is like.
She knows how awful I am, and yet she still smiles at me... that girl.
Do not be mad at me.
I have a plan for it.
If I stay and fight, it should be easier for you to escape anyways!
Or would you rather stay and kill each other?!
Do you want me to prove how crazy I am?!
It is the light that appears when a Titan transforms!
Then we are just in time.
We believe the enemy has already transformed!
First thing is to find the enemy and let the others know!
They should be fleeing from the forest!
Is that the scream of a Titan?
She is the one they took!
Why are you the only one here?!
Did she turn into a Titan and fight with Reiner?!
Did you get away from Reiner?!
Is she keeping an eye out for Reiner?
Why... is she looking at everybody one by one?
I cannot be the only one who could have guessed it would turn out this way!
She is clearly hostile to us now!
Looks like she is cooperating with Reiner!
Get on your horse and chase!
I am getting him back no matter what!
Even if it means trading my life for it!
The intense emotions of friends made foe... spill and clash on the battlefield.
But soldiers are falling far too quickly.
In a gamble waging the fate of humanity, Erwin executes a do-or-die strategy.
